Reviews.Title: JUNK Camera
Reviews.Author: Jaclyn Rosencutter
Reviews.Content: Junk - junk - junk! Dont believe the seller or his description of this product. The seller wrote me 3 emails basically saying the same thing as his online description said. However, It didn't make the piece crap work. I'm stuck with this piece of crap and now I' out another $16 for a sd card. Before purchasing anything from this guy contact me... I've discovered his truck... Purchase defective products for pennies and sell them on amazon. All the time hoping you miss the deadline for his worthless crap. You would think a couple of days wouldn't matter when it comes to customer serviceBUYERS BE WARE!

Reviews.Title: DOES NOT WORK, TOTALLY WORTHLESS
Reviews.Author: Mike Dunn "portrait"
Reviews.Content: This would have been a great gadget if it actually worked, IT DOES NOT WORK. First even though the video quality is very good the view angle is way too narrow to be of any use. Easy to setup, you have to turn it on then press the on button twice to set the motion detection on, however it sets in two seconds and if you are there you set off the camera, it records for 5 minutes then shuts off forever. It only records once. I was able to set the motion detection and get away in two seconds. BUT here is the catch, you have to turn it off to save the recording, the battery dies within a couple of hours and whatever was recorded does not get saved when that happens. So unless you are Houdini and can disappear in two seconds, and know exactly when and what you want to record and shut if off manually within a couple of hours this thing is totally useless. Do Not BUY this product.

Reviews.Title: bad angle.
Reviews.Author: michael
Reviews.Content: unless you have a perfect square room. the angles and view do not work. would be nice if the lens was moveable.

Reviews.Title: It's cheap, what do you expect?
Reviews.Author: Jon H
Reviews.Content: If you want a high tech hidden camera that will make you fell like you're a professional spy, this isn't it.  If you want an affordable hidden camera that works alright (once you figure out how it works), this one isn't bad.The picture quality is good, once you figure out the frame of referance that you want to shoot.  The instructions are more than confusing, but with a little tinkering and trial and error, the product worked just fine.Overall: Mehh...  But what did you expect for a $20 hidden camera?

Reviews.Title: WORST SELLER PICES OF JUNK NOT HD DOESNT EVEN WORK EVER SELLING BROKEN PRODUCTS
Reviews.Author: Denise2012
Reviews.Content: Worst thing I ever bought on Amazon, why does amazon keep these people selling junk on their site..multiple people said it doesn't work, and right out of the box it didn't no power cant charge it no lights as described in the instructions.... for the price your buying an ugly coat hook

Reviews.Title: Eh.. Not great
Reviews.Author: CJ
Reviews.Content: This product worked and was ok to understand instructions but design left me wanting to send it back. Camera is not pointed in a useful angle unless you want to video the ceiling.

Reviews.Title: Not satisfied with this product - returned it
Reviews.Author: S W Martin
Reviews.Content: I returned this product because the motion detection did not work. I was unable to depend on it going into motion detect mode instead of manual mode.

Reviews.Title: Not worth the money
Reviews.Author: Donald-Austin Fuson
Reviews.Content: I bought it becuase people was going through my stuff well the camera didnt work but the voice recording did. but they never talked. So in my case I hate it.

Reviews.Title: don't get hooked
Reviews.Author: Max
Reviews.Content: there was no software to support or run it, and the directions are convoluted and poorly punctuated so I couldn't EVER get the motion detection feature to work.  I found software online but you had to buy the gadget from another company.  If security and surveillance is on your list of priorities, this will only lead to disappointment despite your computer savvy.

Reviews.Title: doesn't have a HD camera
Reviews.Author: Sole
Reviews.Content: it doesn't have a HD camera, i think it has a 1.0 or 1.3 camera its not clear. its good for general looking for whats going on but it still shows the persons face and can be recognize. i like the idea of it where u can fixit any where on the walls, in the garage, entrance, and rooms.

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Content: Not happy with this purchase, not at all what i thought it was the battery dosent stay charged long enough

Reviews.Title: Worst Motion actived product ever!!!!
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: This is the worst motion activated hidden camera of all times. It simply doesn't work at all. I wish I had not wasted my money on it. Junk, Junk, Junk ...... JUNK!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: I need a little help
Reviews.Author: gman
Reviews.Content: I cant tell if this works or not because there are no step by step instructions on how to actually watch the video that you recorded.  If your not computer savoy this is definitely not user friendly.

Reviews.Title: wasn't recognized by os x as anything but a blank cf card
Reviews.Author: Keone
Reviews.Content: this "camera" never actually turned on or recorded anything, despite having a full charge and following the instructions. A green light came on when the "on/off switch" was moved but nothing was saved. When I connected it to my macbook there was no video.BOTTOM LINE:This is a complete rip off!

Reviews.Title: more battery life
Reviews.Author: Klassikat "Kat"
Reviews.Content: Wonderful spyware, a little difficult to program and set time date, also to pinpoint exactly what you are recording, I believe it should give some more instructions on how to setup and what height it should be posted. The battery just don't last long enough.  But as far as clarity of visual and audio, I'd give kudos

Reviews.Title: Price good, product cheap too.
Reviews.Author: Ryan K Lee
Reviews.Content: Made from cheap materials that did not last a month.  The price was worth a shot but you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: yem
Reviews.Content: it is a waste of money, don't buy it. poor picture is not good, it doesn't detect motion, don't waste your money.

Reviews.Title: fino
Reviews.Author: Jonnathan Duarte
Reviews.Content: good product is what I needed met my expectations. thanks for apoyo.espero in future keep buying good as the one I bid produtos

Reviews.Title: Motion activated camera/
Reviews.Author: kathyh1
Reviews.Content: I have installed it but have had no reason to look at the pictures it many have taken. I like having it and I will make use of it .

Reviews.Title: Do Not Buy! !
Reviews.Author: Susan Goodwin
Reviews.Content: No cords, wires, or instructions. I do not have a usb cord to fit it so it is useless to me.

Reviews.Title: New High Definition Motion-Activated Clothes Hanger high-defition Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael M Perez Sr
Reviews.Content: Stop and think before you buy this item It doesn't work, I wouldn't recommend this to my enemies let alone my friends.

Reviews.Title: 1 out of 2
Reviews.Author: Santiago Velazquez
Reviews.Content: Bought 2. One is working OK. Other one never took a charge. Still trying to charge it. Do not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Did not work.
Reviews.Author: John M Casillas
Reviews.Content: When I received my camera I charged it just like the directions told me to, when I tried to go into video record mode it never did. Still hasn't.

Reviews.Title: Like
Reviews.Author: daniel mason
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating for the simple reason that I like that you can charge the unit via computer and  that it takes a flash card

Reviews.Title: HD clothes hanger
Reviews.Author: Vernon Siders Jr. "SSgt Inspiration"
Reviews.Content: Hello! This is an awesome item to be used for the covert experience in the workplace! I cannot wait to hook it up.  (no puns intended)

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Brenda M.
Reviews.Content: I was a little scared to buy this but once I got it I loved it def something I think someone should buy very fast shipping

Reviews.Title: clothes hanger camera
Reviews.Author: duke
Reviews.Content: great service, fast delivery, great packaging, little hard to work still learning about it! also bigger than i thought it would be. all in all id buy again!

Reviews.Title: I like this design
Reviews.Author: Henry Ly
Reviews.Content: The battery last very short even though it is in motion detection mode. Batter should last for a day other wise, it is not very userfull.

Reviews.Title: I like it BUT!
Reviews.Author: Marin
Reviews.Content: I liked it, it was great video and sound for the price BUT the motion activation wasn't really working. It would work within an hours time but after that it just wouldn't pick up motion...

Reviews.Title: A little complicated at first
Reviews.Author: Christophor Napier
Reviews.Content: I live in an apartment and management can enter anytime they want and I just wanted to make sure that no one is coming in when I'm not there.. Wish there was a little more feedback on its operation.

Reviews.Title: Junk, absolute junk.
Reviews.Author: D
Reviews.Content: What a mistake I made purchasing this junk.  The instructions are so poorly translated from Chinese they make no sense.  I have tried every variation of possible settings based on whatever I believe it might say and I can get no reliable results.  "Long hold button, (except the button happens to be long) the green light flashes then turns off, start taking pictures manually." (Manually?..it's a friggin spy cam). "Then press short button, the green light lit, enter the standby mode, and save the file....... "  There are a couple of modes, but since it is a crapshoot on what mode it is in you cannot really know if it is shooting, or it isn't....how am I supposed to leave this thing to spy on people if I cannot even shoot a test picture reliably?  The lights don't blink, they either stay on or they go off.  If I hit the button over and over the lights still don't tell me what is going on.  What is wrong with putting a mode switch on it?The instructional picture is so small and low res that nothing can be identified if you didn't already know what it did.  And there are more parts in the picture than on the camera so I'm not even sure what 'model' this thing might be and why it varies from the picture.Here is another winner in the instructions:  "push on/off to off, that's ok".  Seriously, that's what it says.And now, to hit the return item button and start shopping anew for a better product.

Reviews.Title: didn't work
Reviews.Author: Richard Vogel
Reviews.Content: don't waste your money it does not work. I tried the instructions every which way and the thing does not work. the seller said to return it but it was not worth the shipping or the trouble to do so.

Reviews.Title: it works great
Reviews.Author: wilton
Reviews.Content: it work great i like it's good to use and it so cool i like this is boring there said it.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Margarita Meyers
Reviews.Content: very easy to set up and use i would recommend this to anyone looking for a hidden camera.love it a lot

Reviews.Title: Good product!
Reviews.Author: roger chavarria
Reviews.Content: It's a good safety mechanism and it has served efficiently, highly recommend it for those who like to be protected.

Reviews.Title: Dont work
Reviews.Author: Alain B.
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this stupid camera, it dont work ... and the  quality is very bad also.do not buy

Reviews.Title: I spy
Reviews.Author: frank
Reviews.Content: Well I found my boss upset that they stole his wheels off his chair. So I installed a aka coat hanger for him when they went in and mess his office up, I smiled and said I might know who might of done it. Told him that was not really a coat hanger. Lets just end the story that his wheels or anything else will not be played with. Now lets see if I get a pay raise. If mot I know how to turn it off. :-)

ProductInfo.Features:
You can easily install this clothes hanger with the sticky pad at the back of anywhere you want and it will bring convenience and fun to your daily life. When motion is detected, the camera will start recording automatically. This mini gadget will faithfully record your uninvited guest's action and can act as proof provider for further use when there is any accident.
The images produced by this camera are great quality (1280 x 960 resolutions). With the built-in battery, you can charge the mini hook with USB cable attached. This clothes hanger spy camera supports TF/MicroSD card expansion up to 16GB. The video files will be saved automatically after recording for 30mins or if out of power. This spy gadget will keep your home under surveillance as a safe guard.
